headline: Risk Is Back On. The Nasdaq Is Up 1.2%.
summary: Risk was back on in a big way again on Monday. The S&P 500 rallied 0.7%. The Nasdaq Composite gained 1.2%. The Dow rose 54 points, or 0.1%. The Russell 2000 was up 0.9%.  Tech was the top performing sector, while momentum, risk, and growth-focused exchange-traded funds shined.

summary: GameStop appears to be moving away from Bitcoin and exploring another Hail Mary to bolster its valuation rapidly.
